programme.title: Pilot
programme.desc: King of Queens, S01E01, In-laws (Jerry Stiller, Lisa Rieffel) displace Doug Heffernan (Kevin James) and his 70-inch TV from a basement lair; with Leah Remini.

programme.title: Fat City
programme.desc: King of Queens, S01E02, Doug tries to trick Carrie into going on a diet after he sees a photo of her overweight mother. With Jerry Stiller.

programme.title: Cello, Goodbye
programme.desc: King of Queens, S01E03, Doug feels threatened when Carrie's new job at a law firm gives her a taste of big-city sophistication.

programme.title: Richie's Song
programme.desc: King of Queens, S01E04, Doug can't work up the courage to tell Richie (Larry Romano) that his wife (Michele Maika) is cheating on him.

programme.title: Paternal Affairs
programme.desc: King of Queens, S01E05, Arthur is immediately smitten with Doug's favorite aunt (Brenda Vaccaro) and asks permission to court her.

programme.title: Head First
programme.desc: King of Queens, S01E06, Doug makes an effort to be more friendly with Arthur and soon discovers the benefits and risks of allowing his father-in-law to tag along with him in public.

programme.title: The Rock
programme.desc: King of Queens, S01E07, Doug and Carrie debate the advantages of selling her engagement ring after discovering that it is worth a fortune.

programme.title: Educating Doug
programme.desc: King of Queens, S01E08, Carrie feels that she and Doug are getting stupid as a couple, so she enrolls them and Spence into a class where they read a book and discuss it.

programme.title: Road Rage
programme.desc: King of Queens, S01E09, Doug loses his license to drive after Ray Barone (Ray Romano) cheats off his driving test. Brad Garrett and Peter Boyle also guest star.

programme.title: Supermarket Story
programme.desc: King of Queens, S01E10, Doug, Carrie and Arthur face a chaotic trip to the grocery store on the day before Thanksgiving; Doug encounters a stranger from his past.

programme.title: Noel Cowards
programme.desc: King of Queens, S01E11, Arthur's Christmas gift to Doug and Carrie provides a solution to the couple's car troubles that ends up being worse than the problem.

programme.title: Fixer Upper
programme.desc: King of Queens, S01E12, Carrie fixes Spence (Patton Oswalt) up with an extremely timid girl from her office, but advice from Doug threatens a good thing.

programme.title: Best Man
programme.desc: King of Queens, S01E13, Doug learns that Carrie was once the lover of the groom at a wedding they are attending; Arthur is unhappy when he doesn't get the entree that he ordered at the reception.

programme.title: Dog Days
programme.desc: King of Queens, S01E14, A barking dog means sleepless nights for Doug and Carrie; Arthur thinks that a popular comic strip is based on his life.

programme.title: Crappy Birthday
programme.desc: King of Queens, S01E15, Doug forgets Carrie's 30th birthday and has plans to watch the wrestling match; Doug must scramble to put together a romantic evening.

programme.title: S'Ain't Valentine's
programme.desc: King of Queens, S01E16, Arthur meets an intoxicating stranger at a singles' dance; Carrie and Doug's romantic evening is spoiled.

programme.title: Court Date
programme.desc: King of Queens, S01E17, Doug encourages Carrie to date the police officer who stopped her, hoping to get out of her fourth traffic ticket of the year and avoid a hefty increase in their car insurance.

programme.title: White Collar
programme.desc: King of Queens, S01E18, Doug inherits his shift supervisor's job after an untimely death but soon misses his old responsibilities.

programme.title: Rainy Day

programme.title: Train Wreck
programme.desc: King of Queens, S01E20, Doug is disappointed when Carrie isn't jealous of his beautiful trainee; Arthur feels he's been scammed when he orders a gravestone.

programme.title: Hungry Man
programme.desc: King of Queens, S01E21, Carrie is embarrassed by Doug when he shows up unexpectedly and famished at her boss's elegant "drinks-only" cocktail party.

programme.title: Time Share

programme.title: Where's Poppa?
programme.desc: King of Queens, S01E23, Doug convinces cousin Danny (Gary Valentine) to take Arthur for the weekend; Doug is hit by a baseball and meets a new friend (Bill Cosby) at Dr. Becker's (Ted Danson) office.

programme.title: Art House
programme.desc: King of Queens, S01E24, Arthur moves into his own apartment after Doug tells him how he feels about his eccentric behavior; Carrie is concerned that her father can't take care of himself.

programme.title: Maybe Baby
programme.desc: King of Queens, S01E25, A visit with Deacon's three-year-old son prompts Doug and Carrie think about having a baby; Arthur recalls the night Carrie was born.

programme.title: Queasy Rider
programme.desc: King of Queens, S02E01, Doug buys a motorcycle against Carrie's wishes, prompting her to take up cigarette smoking to spite him.

programme.title: Female Problems
programme.desc: King of Queens, S02E02, Doug encourages Carrie to make new friends but then he feels left out when she starts spending a lot of time with their new neighbor.

programme.title: Assaulted Nuts
programme.desc: King of Queens, S02E03, After Doug convinces Carrie he doesn't goof around at work, horseplay gets him into a painful and embarrassing predicament.

programme.title: Tube Stakes
programme.desc: King of Queens, S02E05, Doug gets upset with Carrie after his big-screen TV set is stolen because she accidentally left the garage door open.

programme.title: Doug Out

programme.title: Get Away

programme.title: Dire Strayts

programme.title: I, Candy

programme.title: Roamin' Holiday
programme.desc: King of Queens, S02E10, Doug invites Spence to move in as part of a plan to keep Carrie's annoying friends from spending a weekend.

programme.title: Sparing Carrie
programme.desc: King of Queens, S02E11, Doug's bowling-team sponsor demands victory, meaning Doug may have to fire his team's weak link: his wife, Carrie.

programme.title: Behind Every Great Man

programme.title: From There To Here
programme.desc: The New Frontier: From There To Here, S01E01, Series introduction and the study of Earth from orbit.

programme.title: Danger, Astreroids Ahead
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Danger, Astreroids Ahead, S02E07, The question often rises is the cost of space exploration really worth it? Could the money be better spent elsewhere.

programme.title: Living Planet
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Living Planet, S03E07, With continuous observation of arth from orbit scientists have built a data set over time that reveals much about how the Earth breaths and life sustains itself on this living Planet.

programme.title: The Moons of Olympis
programme.desc: The New Frontier: The Moons of Olympis, S01E07, These are the the Moon's of the gas giants. Each a unique and mysterious world of its own. Some have oceans of water, geysers of Sulphur or atmospheres of plastic.

programme.title: GIANTS IN THE DARK
programme.desc: The New Frontier: GIANTS IN THE DARK, S05E06, Asteroids, the debris from the early solar system hold tantalizing clues to planetary formation. The spacecraft Psyche readies to study a unique metallic asteroid.

programme.title: Hyabusa
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Hyabusa, S04E05, The Japanese Asteroid sample return mission has reached its target and is surveying the space rock ready to dip down and take a sample.

programme.title: The Space Race, The Hubble, Chasing Comets & Space Debris
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E01, Cold War & The Start of the Space Race - Cold War rivalry and the acceleration of space exploration. Servicing Hubble - Preparations for Hubble's final servicing mission. Chasing a Comet - Launch and the difficult path to rendezvous.

programme.title: Project Mercury, The Mars Express & The Soyuz Launch System
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E02, Project Mercury Begins - The start of NASA & America's first manned space program. Mars Express - The European Space Agency's Mars Satellite. The Soyuz Launch System - The gradual evolution of Russia's Soyuz launcher.

programme.title: Project Mercury Advancement, Camera Tracking & The International Space Station
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E03, Project Mercury Advances - America's first manned space program finally puts a man in orbit. Camera Tracking - The array of special cameras that follow a spacecraft at launch. The International Space Station - The building and operation.

programme.title: Project Gemini, Venus Express, EMU & Deep Space Communication
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E04, Project Gemini Commences - Did Gemini give the US a lead in the space race? Venus Express - The last days of ESA's Venus probe. EMU - NASA's Extravehicular Mobility Unit. Deep Space Communications - ESA's worldwide network of giant dishes.

programme.title: Project Gemini Advances, Cassini at Saturn & More About Mars
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E05, Project Gemini Advances - NASA refines the techniques needed for rendezvous. Cassini at Saturn - In the Cassini probe's final years of activity, its handlers are asking it to do more complex and risky assignments.

programme.title: Project Gemini Docking, Mars Curiousity & Satellite Swarms
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E06, Project Gemini: Docking and EVA - In the final phase of the Gemini program NASA struggles with docking and spacewalks. Curiosity Roving Mars - On the surface of Mars the Curiosity rover is changing the way we think about the red planet.

programme.title: The Apollo Program Begins, Caves & Planck
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E07, The Apollo Program Begins - At the very beginning of NASA's moon project things go wrong. Caves - ESA's special training program for astronauts. Planck - Mapping the cosmic microwave background radiation.

programme.title: Rebuilding Apollo, Orbiting Carbon & Zero Gravity Training
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E08, Rebuilding Project Apollo - After the Apollo 1 disaster NASA resumes manned space flight. Orbiting Carbon Observatory 2 - Monitoring the Earth's Co2 levels in unprecedented detail. Zero Gravity Training - Parabolic flights.

programme.title: Beyond Earth Orbit, IXV Vehicles & Galileo Satellites Lost and Found
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E09, Beyond Earth Orbit - The Apollo program takes bold new steps. IXV Re-entry Vehicle - Europe is working to perfect a re-entry vehicle. Galileo Satellites Lost and Found - Navigation satellites go into incorrect orbit.

programme.title: To The Moon, SpaceX's Dragon and Falcon & GAIA
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E10, To the Moon - The Apollo program achieves its major objective. Dragon, Falcon and Spacex - New directions in re-usable spacecraft. Gaia- Mapping our galaxy in unprecedented detail.

programme.title: The Beginning of the End, Apollo Gets Complicated & The End of Apollo
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E11, The Beginning of the End - After the first Moon landing the Apollo science program was about to start in earnest but people were losing interest. Apollo Gets Complicated - New technology is added that extends the reach of the Apollo program.

programme.title: The Shuttle Program, The Challenger Disaster & Return to Space
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E12, The Shuttle Program - The first re-useable spacecraft. The Challenger Disaster - Pressing launch schedules lead to carelessness and the loss of the Challenger. Return to Space - A re-designed shuttle is back in space with a redefined role.

programme.title: The Space Shuttle Matures, Complex Space Construction & The Final Years of the Space Shuttle
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E13, The Space Shuttle Matures - The Space Transportation System changes the nature of orbital missions. Complex Construction in Space - Confidence in the shuttle begins to return and engineers for get the lessons of the past.

programme.title: What Is Space?
programme.desc: The Fabric of the Cosmos: What Is Space?, S01E01, Brian Greene reveals space as a dynamic fabric that can stretch, twist, warp, and ripple under the influence of gravity, and explores dark energy, which makes up 70% of the universe.

programme.title: The Illusion of Time
programme.desc: The Fabric of the Cosmos: The Illusion of Time, S01E02, Brian Greene takes us on the ultimate time traveling adventure, hurtling 50 years into the future before stepping into a wormhole to travel back to Big Bang.

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.desc: The Fabric of the Cosmos: Quantum Leap, S01E03, Join Brian Greene on a wild ride into the weird realm of quantum physics, which governs the universe on the tiniest of scales.

programme.title: Universe or Multiverse?
programme.desc: The Fabric of the Cosmos: Universe or Multiverse?, S01E04, Cutting-edge theories are suggesting that our universe may not be the only universe. Instead, it may be just one of an infinite number of worlds that make up the multiverse.

programme.title: Edge of The Universe
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Edge of The Universe, S01E10, The night sky is a time machine. The further we look out into the universe the further back in time we reach.

programme.title: Atmosphere
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Atmosphere, S03E02, How do astronauts cope with living in space?

programme.title: Invasion on Mars
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Invasion on Mars, S03E04, The EXO Mars and Curiosity continue their scientific discoveries as we prepare new missions both robotic and manned to the Red planet Mars.

programme.title: Set Course For Heart of the Sun
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Set Course For Heart of the Sun, S04E02, NASA’S Parker Solar Probe Mission is on its way and will be shortly followed by Europe’s Solar probe Mission.

programme.title: THE NEXT BIG LEAPS
programme.desc: The New Frontier: THE NEXT BIG LEAPS, S05E10, Projects in the works. SunRISE, SPHEREx, NEOS and others, their mission to expand our knowledge of Earth, the surrounding space, Dark Matter, and the earliest galaxies. N

programme.title: Where Are All the Aliens?
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Where Are All the Aliens?, S04E10, We’re looking hard, but the numbers aren’t stacking up, is life on other planets that hard to find? Even signals from an advanced race elude us.

programme.title: The Dark Side
programme.desc: The New Frontier: The Dark Side, S02E10, Perhaps that American politician was right. There are indeed things we know we don’t know.

programme.desc: Doctor Who: Carnival of Monsters, S01E01, The Doctor is free to roam space and time again, but having planned to visit Metebelis Three, the Doctor and Jo actually find themselves stowaways aboard a ship in the 1920s, heading for Bombay.

programme.title: Episode 2
programme.desc: Doctor Who: Carnival of Monsters, S01E02, The Doctor and Jo realise that they are actually trapped in a loop on a miniaturised version of Earth in which the other ship passengers endlessly repeat their actions.

programme.title: Episode 3
programme.desc: Doctor Who: Carnival of Monsters, S01E03, Having escaped from the ship, the Doctor and Jo find themselves stuck inside the workings of a giant machine. Can they find their way out?

programme.title: Episode 4
programme.desc: Doctor Who: Carnival of Monsters, S01E04, The Doctor is reunited with the TARDIS and now full size, but Jo is still trapped within the machine. When the Doctor meets the operators of the Scope he learms that Jo is in grave danger.

programme.title: Part 1
programme.desc: Doctor Who: Planet of the Daleks, S01E01, Injured by an Orgron gun, the Doctor asks the Time Lords to send the TARDIS after the Daleks. Leaving him asleep, Jo goes to explore the planet Spirodon.

programme.title: Part 2
programme.desc: Doctor Who: Planet of the Daleks, S01E02, The Doctor recovers from his coma and befriends a Thal expedition but is captured by the Daleks and taken to their base. Then a second Thal expedition arrives with terrible news.

programme.title: Part 3
programme.desc: Doctor Who: Planet of the Daleks, S01E03, In Dalek city, the Doctor breaks out of his prison cell and joins forces with the Thals. With the Daleks in pursuit, the Doctor is forced to improvise a daring escape plan.

programme.title: Part 4
programme.desc: Doctor Who: Planet of the Daleks, S01E04, The Doctor and the Thals escape from the Dalek city and the Doctor is delighted to find that Jo is alive. The Daleks are preparing a deadly bacteria to kill all life on the planet.

programme.title: Part 5
programme.desc: Doctor Who: Planet of the Daleks, S01E05, Desperate to prevent the Daleks from releasing their plague, the Doctor, Jo and the Thals infiltrate the Dalek base. But the Daleks detect the intruders!

programme.title: Part 6
programme.desc: Doctor Who: Planet of the Daleks, S01E06, A force of ten thousand Daleks are coming to life below the surface of Spiridon. The Doctor and the Thals must find a way to defeat the Daleks before they invade the galaxy.

programme.title: Part 1
programme.desc: Doctor Who: The Green Death, S01E01, In Wales, a dead miner is found glowing green. UNIT investigates and Jo empathizes with the environmentalism of Cliff Jones who is opposing the pollution from Global Chemicals.

programme.title: Part 2
programme.desc: Doctor Who: The Green Death, S01E02, Investigating the old mine workings, Jo and the miner, Bert, become trapped beneath the surface when the lift is sabotaged. Bert touches some green slime and becomes infected.

programme.title: Part 3
programme.desc: Doctor Who: The Green Death, S01E03, The Doctor and Jo discover the mine’s terrible secret. Global Chemicals’ managing director, Stevens is determined that they won’t live to reveal what they have learnt.

programme.title: Part 4
programme.desc: Doctor Who: The Green Death, S01E04, The Brigadier attempts to seal the giant maggots in the mine with explosives, but this only results in the creatures burrowing to the surface.

programme.title: Part 5
programme.desc: Doctor Who: The Green Death, S01E05, Captain Mike Yates is taken over by the supercomputer, BOSS and ordered to kill the Doctor. Cliff and Jo are trapped by the maggots as UNIT launch their attack.

programme.title: Part 6
programme.desc: Doctor Who: The Green Death, S01E06, Cliff is dying, and maggots are on the verge of transforming into giant flying insects. Time is running out for the Doctor as BOSS launches its plan for world domination.

programme.title: The Shopping Cart Killer
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E03, A dry cleaning tag inside a sweatshirt left at a crime scene helps police track down a serial killer and rapist who had been eluding them for years.

programme.title: Blood Money/Precious Doe
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E20, Testimony about the growth of larvae in dead bodies helps convict the man who stabbed a couple to death and strangled their 4-year-old daughter in 1993.

programme.title: Danny Bible/License To Kill
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E21, A Texas woman's murder is finally solved when the killer's plan to kill a second woman and stuff her into a duffel bag goes awry.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E21, A quarter of a century after the murders of two nurses, Canadian police suspect that a former Toronto cop committed the crimes. A blow to the head of a garbage collector in San Jose leaves strange markings.

programme.title: The School Teacher
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E04, When 25-year-old school teacher Christy Mirack is found murdered in her apartment in 1992, there is no shortage of suspects.

programme.title: Love and Hate
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E07, Near what's known as the hanging tree, the mutilated body of Timothy Coggins is found in late 1983. The investigation is thwarted and the case freezes for over 30 years, until a newly elected sheriff vows to bring the killers to justice.

programme.title: Killer on Campus / The Bow Hunter
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E15, Thirty-two years after the killing of University of Michigan law student Jane Mixer, police use DNA found on her pantyhose to finally track down the killer.

programme.title: A Lesson in Homicide
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E11, When a schoolteacher is found murdered in her New Jersey apartment in the fall of 2009, suspicion is cast on her soon to be ex-husband. Long after the case goes cold, a detective embarks on a mission to help the man clear his name.

programme.title: The Original Nightstalker
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E05, In the 1980s, a serial killer prowled the posh streets of Orange County. Police were unaware of the serial attacks until 1996, when DNA revealed the killer's secret and they linked four murders to a single DNA profile.

programme.title: Taken in Tacoma
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S03E06, When 13-year-old Jennifer Bastian is abducted and murdered in August of 1986, residents of Tacoma panic. This is the second young girl killed in five months. Convinced a predator is loose, Police embark on a 32-year inquiry.

programme.title: Murder In the Midwest
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S03E03, The body of Lori Nesson is found in a ditch in 1974, yet her death is not ruled a homicide. After four decades, the cause of death is changed to homicide, and the search begins for a killer.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E4016, DNA evidence found on a murder victim whose body had been dumped in a Dairy Queen drive-thru leads to the arrest of Houston's notorious "tourniquet killer."

programme.title: Cold Ashes
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E20, When a deadly house fire claims the life of a family in rural Oklahoma, investigators suspect foul play and it sends a mother on a decades-long crusade to find out what happened to her missing teenage daughter and best friend.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E20, Police run down more than 11,000 leads before coming up with a suspect in the murders of three Virginia girls, and the abduction and strangulation of a California woman continue to baffle the investigators more than 11 years after the crime.

programme.title: Devil In Disguise
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E06, A 23-year-old teacher vanished the evening before Easter after giving confession. Her body was later found floating in a drainage canal. At the time, a key witness hinted that a member of the Catholic clergy may have been responsible.

programme.title: Mistaken for a Killer/The Boy and the Monster
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E27, Advances in DNA technology that take place over 20 years help police to finally identify the man who brutally stabbed two women to death.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E15, Fire investigator Jack Malooly helps crack the case of an arsonist and killer who set fires to collect insurance money, and a prison inmate tells a detective that he can't help him with his current investigation, but knows about a 15-year-old murder.

MST3K: Bride Of The Monster, 19930123000000 +0000, Horror cinema icons Bela Lugosi and Tor Johnson star in this Ed Wood classic as the crazed Dr. Vornoff and his beastly assistant Lobo, who conduct heinous experiments on human victims in an effort to create a race of atomic super-beings.

programme.title: Hamlet
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Hamlet, S10E09, A dour production of Shakespeare’s play produced for German TV. A prince returns home for his father’s funeral and doesn’t like what he finds.
MST3K: Doctor Mordrid, 20220610000000 +0000, Emily's crew watch as the magical DOCTOR MORDRID (1992) defends Earth from the forces of evil, and Dr. Kabahl schemes to increase viewership.
MST3K: First Spaceship On Venus, 19901229000000 +0000, A multinational team of astronauts heads to Venus, but finds a world destroyed by nuclear war.

programme.title: Lost Continent
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Lost Continent, S02E08, A military team sent to search for a lost rocket ends up trapped on a mountain inhabited by dinosaurs in Lost Continent.
MST3K: The Christmas Dragon, 20221216000000 +0000, All three hosts watch a group of precocious orphans attempt save a dying Father Christmas in THE CHRISTMAS DRAGON (2014).

programme.title: Red Zone Cuba
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Red Zone Cuba, S06E19, An escaped convict and his two pals take part in the Bay of Pigs invasion, then return home with a plan to get rich.

MST3K: The Day The Earth Froze, 19930116000000 +0000, Joel and the Bots learn the ins and outs of the circus in the short Here Comes the Circus (1946) and then try to make sense of the Nordic fairy tale film The Day the Earth Froze (1959).

MST3K: Bride Of The Monster, 19930123000000 +0000, Horror cinema icons Bela Lugosi and Tor Johnson star in this Ed Wood classic as the crazed Dr. Vornoff and his beastly assistant Lobo, who conduct heinous experiments on human victims in an effort to create a race of atomic super-beings.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement
programme.desc: When Calls the Heart, S01E11, Hallmark Original Series. Jack is hailed a hero after putting away the Tolliver outlaws.

programme.title: Prelude to a Kiss
programme.desc: When Calls the Heart, S01E12, Hallmark Original Series. Abigail is beginning to let go of her grief and look toward the future.

The Love Letter (Crown Media), 19980201000000 +0000, Romantic fantasy unfolds when a young man finds a hundred year old letter in an empty desk. Stars Campbell Scott and Jennifer Jason Leigh. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame Collection.

The Magic of Ordinary Days, 20050130000000 +0000, Pregnant out of wedlock, an educated young woman is pressured by her father into an arranged marriage with a lonely farmer in this drama set during WWII. Stars Keri Russell and Skeet Ulrich.

A Way Back Home, 20130601000000 +0000, When a young musician returns to his hometown at Christmastime, he repairs old wounds and learns the power of forgiveness. Inspired by the paintings of Norman Rockwell. Stars Danny Glover, Austin Stowell and Kayla Ewell.

The Blackwater Lightship, 20040204000000 +0000, Based on the novel by Colm Toibin, The Blackwater Lightship tells the compelling story of reconciliation between three generations of women that has been marked by decades of misunderstandings.

Remember Sunday, 20130421000000 +0000, A down-on-her-luck waitress meets jewelry store clerk, Gus, but complications ensue because of his memory problems. A brain aneurysm three years earlier gives Gus a blank slate the second his alarm wakes him each day.

All Yours, 20160402000000 +0000, Cass, a high-powered attorney and single mother of two, is on the hunt for a new nanny after her precocious kids ran off the last one. Stars Nicollette Sheridan, Dan Payne and Jayne Eastwood.

Hello, It's Me, 20150927000000 +0000, A woman coping with the loss of her husband and the task of raising two children on her own meets a handsome, rich man but doesn't feel right about pursuing anything. Stars Kellie Martin and Kavan Smith.

programme.title: Truth
programme.desc: Good Witch, S02E08, Hallmark Original Series. Cassie works her magic to help Sam make a tough decision.

Loving Leah, 20090125000000 +0000, When Leah's husband Benjamin dies suddenly, Benjamin's brother Jake is stunned to learn he is expected to marry Leah to carry on the name. Jake suggests to Leah that they get married and maintain a secretly platonic relationship.

programme.title: Within The Serpent's Grasp
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S01E22, To stop the Goa'uld invasion, the SG-1 team disobeys orders and transports itself to the Goa'uld attack headquarters. Landing amidst preparations for an all-out strike on Earth, the way home is blocked. Can the team avert disaster and save humanity?

programme.title: Critical Mass
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S02E13, The team races to foil the Goa'uld's plans to destroy Atlantis after Maj. Gen. Landry informs them that a bomb has been planted, triggered to detonate the next time the team heads to Earth. Meanwhile, two Wraith ships are heading towards Atlantis.

programme.title: Grace Under Pressure
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S02E14, While testing a newly repaired puddle jumper, McKay and Captain Hugh Griffin suddenly lose control of the ship and crash into the ocean. As the jumper begins to sink slowly towards the bottom of the ocean, Griffin sacrifices himself to save McKay.

programme.title: The Tower
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S02E15, Sheppard and the team discover a world that has technology created by the Ancients. But the planet's royal family does not allow anyone but them to harness the technology and treat the villagers with little dignity.

programme.title: The Long Goodbye
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S02E16, The team discover two life pods floating in space. Upon further investigation, the team accidentally transfers the minds of the individuals into Sheppard and Weir. Things get worse when the team discovers the two people are out to destroy the other.

programme.title: Coup D'Etat
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S02E17, Col. Sheppard's team is urgently summoned to M1K-177, where Maj. Lorne's team has been attacked. When Sheppard and his unit arrive, however, all they find is a burned building containing charred bodies: presumably, Lorne and his men.

programme.title: Michael
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S02E18, Lt. Kenmore wakes up in the infirmary without his memory. He begins to think there is something wrong when his nightmares about being a Wraith seem to be more than real. His fears would be unfounded if not for the serum that turns Wraiths humans.

programme.title: Inferno
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S02E19, Sheppard and the team visits the planet Taranis at the invitation of two leading citizens, Dr. Norina Pero and Chancellor Lycus, who want McKay to repair a failing shield generator at an Ancient base, and Ancient warship, they've discovered.

programme.title: Allies
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S02E20, Kenmore arrives back in Atlantis with a group of Wraith, in the midst of a civil war. Kenmore, hoping to leverage his knowledge of Atlantis against Sheppard and the team, suggests a trade; Beckett's serum, in exchange for keeping Atlantis hidden.

programme.title: Alliances
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E13, Greer and Wray find themselves trapped in the midst of an attack when an alien ship carrying a radioactive bomb crashes into Homeworld Command. Meanwhile, Rush (Robert Carlyle) discovers that not everyone wants Greer and Wray back aboard Destiny.

programme.title: Hope
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E14, While connected to the stones in an attempt to contact Homeworld Command, Chloe wakes up with Ginn’s consciousness. Eli must find a way to protect Chloe without losing Ginn. Meanwhile, Volker requires a difficult operation to save his life.

programme.title: Seizure
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E15, Homeworld Command tries to convince an ally they suspect might be infiltrated by the Lucian Alliance to let them use their planet to power up and dial Destiny. Meanwhile, Rush is trapped in a simulation created by Amanda Perry.

programme.title: The Hunt
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E16, While exploring a planet, the team is attacked and members are taken captive by an alien creature. The team must turn to Varro and his Lucian team for help. Meanwhile, on Destiny, Eli and Brody mistakenly trap Brody in a cryogenic device.

programme.title: The Serpent's Lair
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S02E01, When a fleet of Goa'uld warships launches a surprise attack, the SG-1 team uses the Stargate to board an enemy ship with enough explosives to destroy the alien force. But the team's capture suddenly turns their objective into a suicide mission!

programme.title: In The Line Of Duty
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S02E02, On a daring mission to rescue victims of an interplanetary attack, Carter's body is inhabited by a Goa'uld. And now that Carter has brought the demon back to Earth inside her, the SG-1 team must find a way to destroy it....without destroying Carter!

programme.title: Prisoners
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S02E03, When the SG-1 team inadvertently helps a desperate criminal, they are charged as accessories to murder and banished to a penal colony. Only one woman there has the power to help them escape....but freedom might not be worth the price she is asking!

programme.title: The Gamekeeper
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S02E04, Exploring a strange and beautiful garden in a distant world, the team members are trapped, knocked unconscious, and forced to relive their most haunting memories. Now, before they can find their way back home, they must find the way back to reality.

programme.title: Eddie Waitkus
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S10E18, A news report shows a live dead-ringer for Dylan's late father; Noah intrudes on Donna's meeting someone new; Kelly compromises her personal feelings for her profession; David gets the wrong idea when he overhears Camille talking with friends.

programme.title: Ever Heard the One About the Exploding Father?
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S10E20, Dylan's father makes him an offer; Steve lobbies for Ryan's return to college; David interviews for a job in New York; Matt represents a stand-up comic fired for not being funny.

programme.title: The Easter Bunny
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S10E22, Kelly grows suspicious of Matt's distant behavior. Camille tries to convince Donna to sell her clothing online. Steve and Janet fear that her parents' dog is to blame for the death of their snooty neighbors' pet rabbit.

programme.title: And Don't Forget to Give Me Back My Black T-Shirt
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S10E23, Mitch annoys Donna by trying to plan their entire relationship via an electronic organizer. Janet nixes Steve's plans to invest in Donna's site because of their limited finances.

programme.title: Love Is Blind
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S10E24, Dylan's generous wedding gift vexes Kelly and Matt, who consider moving to Seattle; an offer for their tabloid separates the Sanders' professionally; Noah meets Ellen's family; Donna's mother sells her house.

programme.title: The Penultimate
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S10E26, David expresses his feelings for Donna by writing her a giant love note in the sand. Dylan graduates from California University. Matt considers moving to New York to help his sister-in-law raise her child.

programme.title: Ode to Joy
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S10E27, After 10 years, the friends of 90210 say goodbye with a wedding, a reunion, and a few surprises! Just as Donna and David are joining together, Kelly's life is falling apart. Meanwhile, Steve and Janet make some major decisions about their future.

programme.title: Pilot Parts 1 and 2
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S01E001, Twins Brandon and Brenda Walsh experience a very special kind of culture shock when they move from Minnesota to Beverly Hills and begin their new lives at West Beverly High.

programme.title: The Green Room
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S01E002, Brandon meets Dylan McKay, a brooding classmate. As they become friends, Brandon learns that Dylan's bad-boy act masks a hidden life that few people ever see.

programme.title: Every Dream Has Its Price
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S01E003, Brenda shops with Kelly and Tiffany and wishes she had their kind of money.

programme.title: The First Time
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S01E004, Brandon is visited by his ex-girlfriend Sheryl but, when she meets Dylan, she's quickly star-struck by his money and glamor.

programme.title: One on One
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S01E005, When Brandon tries out for the basketball team, he's angered to learn that his main rival is from another district.

programme.title: Higher Education
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S01E006, An unreasonable teacher makes Brandon's life miserable by giving him no grade higher than a C.

programme.title: Perfect Mom
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S01E007, "Delusions of glamour" overcome Brenda when she meets Kelly's beautiful mother Jackie, a former model.

programme.title: K-Gas The Grooveyard of Solid Gold
programme.desc: Baywatch, S05E08, The beach descends into chaos when DJ Larry "Loomin" Large announces a beach wide treasure hunt for a gold pirate doubloon worth $100,000. The Baywatch team is put on high alert when thousands of reckless treasure hunters storm the beach.

programme.title: Red Wind
programme.desc: Baywatch, S05E09, When the hot Santa Ana winds move in from the desert, things start heating up on the Baywatch beach in more ways than one, as it seems like all the “weirdos” in the world have been blown to the beach.

programme.title: I Spike
programme.desc: Baywatch, S05E10, Tracy, a lifeguard-turned-hovercraft expert, arrives at Baywatch to demonstrate the benefits of the new rescue vehicle. Meanwhile, The National Pro Beach Volleyball Tour arrives, reigniting Matt's desire to be a professional beach volleyball star.

programme.title: Silent Night Baywatch Night, Part 1
programme.desc: Baywatch, S05E11, Matt and Hobie rescue a young boy who is being harassed by a thug and take care of him until they can get him to his mother, but he seems to be hiding a deep dark secret. Meanwhile, CJ falls for a handsome young man who turns out to be taboo.

programme.title: Silent Night Baywatch Night, Part 2
programme.desc: Baywatch, S05E12, Joey joins Mitch and Hobie in decorating for Christmas. CJ has a great time working with Father Ryan but starts to worry that he may misinterpret her warmth as flirting, and that he may be considering quitting the priesthood for her.

programme.title: Rubber Ducky
programme.desc: Baywatch, S05E13, Logan's visa is soon to expire, and he will be sent back to Australia unless he gets a green card. He plans on earning the money to purchase one in an upcoming boat race. Meanwhile Mitch’s mother visits.

programme.title: Homecoming
programme.desc: Baywatch, S05E14, Stephanie is kidnapped by an eco-terrorist. The Baywatch team must stop the terrorist before she blows up an oil rig with Stephanie constrained inside it!

programme.title: Seize the Day
programme.desc: Baywatch, S05E15, Mitch proposes to Tracy, but the happy moment is short-lived as she reveals she has a terminal illness. With the team being short-staffed it is up to Logan and Caroline to deal with reckless wave runners.

programme.title: A Little Help From My Friends
programme.desc: Baywatch, S05E16, Mitch is still mourning Tracy’s death, so Hobie seeks help from a radio show to help Mitch recover. Caroline resuscitates a man with AIDS, which puts a strain on her relationship with Logan. And CJ enters a ballroom dancing competition.

programme.title: Father's Day
programme.desc: Baywatch, S05E17, Mitch receives a mysterious package his father had put together before he died. Mitch and his father never saw eye-to-eye, but this gift impacts Mitch more than he ever thought possible. Logan visits a hypnotist to deal with a past trauma.

programme.title: Fire With Fire
programme.desc: Baywatch, S05E18, Andy, an old friend of Mitch, visits Baywatch to complete four days of lifeguard service in order to remain on the active roster. But Andy's strong-arm tactics do not sit well with the other lifeguards.

programme.title: Deep Trouble
programme.desc: Baywatch, S05E19, Matt and CJ stumble upon a homeless man who shockingly turns out to be someone they know very well. Meanwhile, Mitch must rescue a boy's brother from drug smugglers so the boy can receive a life-saving transplant of his brother's bone marrow.

programme.title: Promised Land
programme.desc: Baywatch, S05E20, When testing out a new flying machine, Mitch spots a makeshift raft with a stranded woman in it. Mitch must help the Chinese woman find her sister. Back at headquarters, Matt and Garner deal with a beach robbery scam.

programme.title: The Runaways
programme.desc: Baywatch, S05E21, Prominent British businessman Richard Branson visits Baywatch to perform several risky stunts, putting the lifeguards on high alert. Meanwhile, Mitch has to save one of Kaye's employees whose violent husband has come looking for her.

programme.title: Wet and Wild
programme.desc: Baywatch, S05E22, Hobie is thrilled when the “Johnny Danger Stunt Show" comes to the beach, but Mitch finds Johnny has questionable morals and is worried Hobie may follow his example. Matt is accused of sexual harassment by bad girl lifeguard Neely.

programme.title: Trapped Beneath the Sea, Part 1
programme.desc: Baywatch, S06E01, Mitch considers a new career working with Garner as a private eye. Logan cheats on Caroline again. The explosion of an offshore oil rig endangers Stephanie, Cody, and Neely.

programme.title: Trapped Beneath the Sea, Part 2
programme.desc: Baywatch, S06E02, As the crippled oil rig sinks and floods with water, Cody, Neely, and Stephanie begin a desperate rescue effort to save the two young couples, and themselves, until the Baywatch lifeguards can arrive to help.

programme.title: Hot Stuff
programme.desc: Baywatch, S06E03, Kaye Morgan asks Hobie to volunteer at a school for young blind children. Things take a dangerous turn when a huge brush fire traps Hobie and the blind children in the hills, and Mitch is the only one who can save them.
